relevant_findings.neck: Supple, no thyromegaly, no jugular venous distention.
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.heart: Regular rate and rhythm with normal S1, S2. No murmurs/rubs/gallops.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, thin scars from transplants. Mild tenderness in right lower quadrant over pancreatic transplant. No rebound, guarding, or rigidity. Good bowel sounds.
relevant_findings.extremities: Left arm covered in a sleeve, swollen, good peripheral pulses, no rashes present.
relevant_findings.neurologic: Alert and oriented x3. Cranial nerves II-XII intact.
